short_summary: Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) - Level 3
description: Purchase Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Level 3 services from Public Works and Government Services Canada. Procurement includes details for Environment, and Indigenous peoples. Share this solicitation with suppliers who meet the indirect source rule and can provide needed services: consequence Management; Frequency tolerance level; Relationship Management; ITS.
